title: Chicken and almond noodle salad
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets, cooked and sliced', '60g almonds', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds', '1 (90g) packet ramen noodles, crushed', '1/2 medium cabbage, shredded', '120ml vegetable oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons vinegar']
